ERR_NETWORK: It seems there is a connection issue. Please try again later.
ERR_BAD_REQUEST: An error occurred. The request could not be processed correctly.
ERR_TIMEOUT: An error occurred. The server could not respond to this resource.
ERR_400: Something went wrong with the request. Please try again.
ERR_401: You do not have access to this resource.
ERR_404: The requested resource was not found. Please check the URL and try again.
ERR_409: There is a conflict in the request. There may be an issue with the submitted data.
ERR_422: The submitted entity could not be processed. Please check the data and try again.
ERR_500: Internal server error. Please try again later.
ERR_502: The server received an invalid response from an upstream server.
ERR_503: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
ERR_504: Gateway timeout. Please try again later.
ECONNABORTED: Timeout occurred, please try again later.
